question: In which event did Vijayveer Sindhu won a Gold medal at the 2018 ISSF Junior World Cup?
explanation: Vijayveer Sindhu has won a Gold Medal at the 2018 ISSF Junior World Cup in the 25m standard pistol. In which event did Saurabh Chaudhary win a Gold Medal at the second 2018 ISSF Junior World Cup?
